definition: to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
Kangxi radical 105, known as 登字頭|登字头[deng1 zi4 tou2]
to land/to come ashore/to make landfall (of typhoon etc)/to log in (frequently used erroneous variant of 登錄|登录[deng1 lu4])
to carry a story/to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)
to climb over/to ascend onto/to mount
to go on stage/fig. to appear on the scene/used in advertising to mean new product
Lee Teng-hui (1923-2020), Taiwanese politician, president of ROC 1988-2000
(Osama) bin Laden (1957-2011), leader of Al Qaeda
to climb/to pull oneself up/to clamber/to scale/fig. to forge ahead in the face of hardships and danger
to publish (in newspapers or magazines)/to record (bookkeeping entries)

sentences.english: Rita repeated what Reardon recited when Reardon road the remarks.
sentences.chinese: 當利爾登閱讀評論時，麗塔複述爾登背誦的東西。

sentences.english: The papers contained no requests for managers.
sentences.chinese: 報紙上沒有登招聘經理的啓事。

sentences.english: My classmates and I started to climb Mount Tai.
sentences.chinese: 我和同學們開始登泰山。

sentences.english: I put up an advertisement in the newspaper for the sale of my car, but there have been no responses so far.
sentences.chinese: 我在報紙上登了賣車廣告，但是到目前爲止尚無迴音。

sentences.english: Can I check this stroller at the gate?
sentences.chinese: 我可以在登機門託運嬰兒推車嗎？

sentences.english: Cardholders will be given a reference number upon successful registration of the Coupon Promotion.
sentences.chinese: 成功登記之客戶於完成登記時將獲發一個參考編號。

sentences.english: Indicate by a check mark whether the registrant has filed all reports required.
sentences.chinese: 用對鉤標記登記者是否提交了所需報告。

sentences.english: But we should be grateful to this Carmarthen courthouse campaign.
sentences.chinese: 但我們應當對喀麥登法院的這一活動心存感激。

sentences.english: I asked him whether Selden had left the country.
After the medal ceremony, I placed an ad in the local paper.
sentences.chinese: 頒獎儀式後，我在當地的報紙登了一個啓示。

sentences.english: I have also decided I will reject any advertising campaigns that insist on advertising with these magazines.
sentences.chinese: 我更加決定不會接拍一些堅持在垃圾雜誌刋登的廣告。

sentences.english: It is posted on the company's website and handed out at the slightest excuse.
sentences.chinese: 個人小傳登在公司網站上，而且動不動就被髮送出去。

sentences.english: Dengar became an independent bounty hunter.
sentences.chinese: 登加成了一名獨立賞金獵人。
那小子就是我的斯諾登。

sentences.english: It's a steakhouse and it's on Camden, I believe.
sentences.chinese: 那是賣牛排的餐館，在卡姆登，我想是。

sentences.english: “I am confident that the problem of obesity can be solved, ” Frieden told me.
sentences.chinese: “我對解決肥胖問題充滿信心，”弗裏登告訴我。

definition: to climb (by pulling oneself up)/to implicate/to claim connections of higher status
handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears
different/unique/special/very/(classical) to behead/to die/to cut off/to separate/to surpass
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge
Shanglin county in Nanning 南寧|南宁[Nan2 ning2], Guangxi
Mt Tai in Shandong/same as 泰山
